程序包 main.controller

类 GameStartController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.GameStartController
public class GameStartController
extends java.lang.Object
The GameStartController class contains several useful class fields and methods. This controller class is specified to control gameStart.fxml. It will be instantiated during the fxml file loading process.

The controller class has basic functions for game starting page, like starting gamegameStart(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent), showing introduction of the gameshowInfo(MouseEvent) ,showing high score listsshowScores(MouseEvent).

since 0.1

    (专用程序包) void exitGame​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox infoBox
      information box for game introduction

  • 构造器详细资料

  • 方法详细资料

    • exitGame

      void exitGame​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      The following method is called when exit option button is clicked.

      Terminate the system with exit code 0, it calls System.exit(n)

      参数:
      event - mouse event when clicking button

    • deleteTempFile

      static void deleteTempFile()
      delete the temp file created for storing level records

    • gameStart

      void gameStart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is called when the start game button is clicked. It loads the gameRunning fxml file and is responsible for switching between the game-start page and game-running page
      参数:
      event - mouse event when clicking button
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if gameRunning.fxml is not found or failed loading

    • showInfo

      void showInfo​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Control the visibility of the information boxinfobox The introduction of the Sokoban game is pre-written in SceneBuilder For modifying the information of the game, simply refer to resources/views/gameStart.fxml to change the content
      参数:
      event - mouse click

    • showScores

      void showScores​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Prompt a window to to show permanent high scores list. Current version requires user to see the high scores list for two maps
      参数:
      event - mouse event when the Scores button is clicked
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the fxml is not found or error loading

    • initialize

      void initialize()
